FORMAT.TITLE: SMS To CUSTOMER AFTER SUCCESSFUL ORDER PLACED
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#, Thank you for your order with Gandhibagh.com! Your order #--ORD_NUM--# is under process. We will reach you soon! Please note: Orders placed after 7pm shall be delivered tomorrow.For any queries please contact our helpdesk 07126630864

FORMAT.TITLE: WELCOME SMS to MERCHANT after SIGN UP

FORMAT.TITLE: WELCOME SMS to CUSTOMER
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,Welcome to gandhibagh.com. Login to gandhibagh.com and explore the largest varieties of products.

FORMAT.TITLE: MERCHANT CHANGES PRICE
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,You have succesfully changed price of your product #--PROD_NAME--#. Login to gandhibagh.com for further details.

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to MERCHANT for LOW INVENTORY
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,Your Product #--PROD_NAME--# has reached minimum stock level at gandhibagh.com.

FORMAT.TITLE: WHEN MERCHANT GETS APPROVAL
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,Your request has been approved. login to gandhibagh.com for more details.

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to CUSTOMER after ORDER CANCELLATION
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#, You have successfully cancelled order #--ORD_NUM--# on gandhibagh.com. Please login and review details.

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to MERCHANT after ORDER CANCELLATION
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,Order no. #--ORD_NUM--# to your e-shop on gandhibagh.com has been cancelled. Please login and review details.

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to CUSTOMER after ORDER CONFIRMATION by MERCHANT
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,Your order #--ORD_NUM--# has been confirmed by the Merchant. For more details login to gandhibagh.com.

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to CUSTOMER after DELIVERY
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,Thank you for choosing Gandhibagh.com. Your order has been successfully delivered.

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to CUSTOMER after DISPATCHED
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,Your order #--ORD_NUM--# has been dispatched for delivery by #--TIME--#. Please keep cash of Rs. #--AMOUNT--# ready with this delivery OTP #--D_OTP--# number. Thank you for shopping with Gandhibagh.com

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to CUSTOMER after DISPATCHED
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,Your order #--ORD_NUM--# has been dispatched for delivery by #--TIME--#. Please provide this OTP #--D_OTP--# to delivery boy. Thank you for shopping with Gandhibagh.com

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to CUSTOMER after ORDER RETURNED
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#, Your order #--ORD_NUM--# has been returned to the Merchant. Thank you for shopping with gandhibagh.com.

FORMAT.TITLE: SMS to Delivery Partner for pickup of product
FORMAT.SMS_TEXT: Dear #--NAME--#,You have a new order from gandhibagh! Order details: Order No. #--ORD_NUM--#, delivery time #--TIME--#, address #--ADDRESS--#. For any queries, please contact our helpdesk 07126630864.
